name: Aviagen Inc
membership: a.v.e.c (www.avec-poultry.eu); Elpha - European Live Poultry Association; EPB - European Poultry Breeders; EFFAB (www.effab.info; www.responsiblebreeding.eu); EurSafe (www.eursafe.org); ATF (www.animaltaskforce.eu); FABRE TP (www.fabretp.eu); WPSA (World's Poultry Science Association); ATA (www.animaltransportassociation.org); European Veterinary Study Group; IPC (www.internationalpoultrycouncil.org), IPWA isu - International Poultry Welfare Alliance in setup. And regional and national associations and cooperations.
goal: Breeding (pedigree) and multiplication of meat chickens and turkeys from a large diverse population base with high health, broad based welfare and sustainability programmes
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Enterprise, Environment, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: EU initiatives in the area of animal welfare, animal health, animal diversity, research and development, technology development, transport, trade
